figure_1.title: Figure 1.
figure_1.caption: Categories of the needs analysis with assignment to the phases of pretreatment and treatment and the stakeholder groups. P = Patients, Ph = Physicians, H = Health insurance company representatives.

claims.sentence: The categories are assigned to the different phases of care, from prevention and diagnosis to the period of therapy and aftercare (Figure 1).
In Figure 1, this category was mapped twice—in the phase of diagnostics and in the phase of therapy—because quality improvement plays a role at various points in the treatment process.3.2.7.
